name: The Wowie Riddle!
description:
Welcome to  the Wowie Riddle! In this game, you will explore various different websites in which your goal is to get to the next page by any means possible.

This game has 10 different levels with puzzles to be solved, you must do things like finding secret messages and accessing different files.

Made in 3 days for the Wowie Jam 3.0.

Also, I have a forum up for the game at silverrain.forumotion.com and there is a Nordinho thread.

Have fun!

(Credit to Inkstypia for Urusans Personal Use Regular)
